price: A oni koji se budu trudili da dokaze Naše poreknu, uvjereni da će Nam umaći, bit će stanovnici Džehennema.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ سَعَوۡاْ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مُعَٰجِزِينَ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna saʿaw fī āyātinā muʿājizīna ulāika aṣḥābu al-jaḥīmi
